name: They Came From a Communist Planet
name_original: They Came From a Communist Planet
description:
THEY CAME FROM A COMMUNIST PLANET is a first-person riot game.

Aliens reach earth and trigger a socialist revolution.

Fight your way past hopelessness and teargas, isolation and riot police.

This is a game about moving from DEPRESSION TO REVOLT.


FEATURES:
  • A chilling tale of senseless greed, engineered depression, and aliens who might offer hope
  • Dynamic and reactive Riot Police AI
  • A highly destructible late-capitalist neighbourhood
